get.description: Retrieve the current status and result of a job by its ID
Subscribe to real-time job status updates via Server-Sent Events (SSE). The connection will remain open until the job completes or an error occurs.
Retrieve information about a specific blockchain.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: A chain name listed in supported networks

get.description: Fetch information about all supported blockchains.

next.description: Cursor for the next page of results

hasNext.description: Indicates if there are more results available

description.example: A revolutionary new token for the Solana ecosystem
A revolutionary new token on Solana

orderIds.description: List of order IDs to cancel

clientOrderIds.description: List of client order IDs to cancel

limit.description: Maximum number of orders to cancel

baseLotSize.description: Minimum tradeable amount of base token

quoteLotSize.description: Minimum tradeable amount of quote token

timestamp.description: Last update timestamp (Unix epoch in seconds)

baseDecimals.description: Number of decimal places for base token

quoteDecimals.description: Number of decimal places for quote token

baseLotSize.description: Minimum tradeable amount of base token

quoteLotSize.description: Minimum tradeable amount of quote token

makerFee.description: Fee rate for makers in basis points (1 = 0.01%)

takerFee.description: Fee rate for takers in basis points (1 = 0.01%)

createTime.description: Market creation timestamp (Unix epoch in seconds)

timeExpiry.description: Market expiry timestamp (Unix epoch in seconds)

price.description: Order price in quote token units

size.description: Order size in base token units

owner.description: Wallet address of the order owner

bids.description: List of buy orders sorted by price (descending)

asks.description: List of sell orders sorted by price (ascending)

spread.description: Price difference between best ask and best bid

price.description: Order price in quote token units

size.description: Order size in base token units

openOrdersAddress.description: User's OpenBook account address for this market
